#
# Huawei VRP OSPF Configuration
# Multi-area OSPF with authentication
#
sysname OSPF-ROUTER-01
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/0
 description Link to Area 0 Backbone
 ip address 10.0.0.1 255.255.255.252
 ospf cost 10
 ospf network-type p2p
 ospf authentication-mode md5 1 cipher OspfAuth123
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/1
 description Link to Area 1
 ip address 10.1.0.1 255.255.255.252
 ospf cost 20
 ospf network-type broadcast
 ospf dr-priority 100
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/2
 description Link to Area 2 (Stub)
 ip address 10.2.0.1 255.255.255.252
 ospf cost 30
 undo shutdown
#
interface LoopBack0
 ip address 1.1.1.1 255.255.255.255
 description Router-ID
#
interface LoopBack1
 ip address 10.255.1.1 255.255.255.255
 description Management Loopback
#
ospf 1 router-id 1.1.1.1
 description Main OSPF Process
 bandwidth-reference 10000
 spf-schedule-interval millisecond 50 200 5000
 silent-interface all
 undo silent-interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/0
 undo silent-interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/1
 undo silent-interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/2
 #
 area 0.0.0.0
  authentication-mode md5 1 cipher OspfAreaAuth
  network 10.0.0.0 0.0.0.3
  network 1.1.1.1 0.0.0.0
 #
 area 0.0.0.1
  network 10.1.0.0 0.0.0.3
  network 10.255.1.1 0.0.0.0
  nssa
 #
 area 0.0.0.2
  network 10.2.0.0 0.0.0.3
  stub no-summary
#
ospf 2 router-id 1.1.1.1 vpn-instance VRF-A
 description VRF-A OSPF Process
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 192.168.0.0 0.0.0.255
#
ip route-static 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 NULL0 preference 200 description Blackhole
#
return
